pages.title: Mob Repelling
pages.text: monsters are super scared of their own heads? It's crazy, if you put a monster head on a fence, they'll run away from it like chickens!

Find a way you can repel monsters using their heads and skulls.$(br2)Oh, everyone knows $(thing)Wither Skeletons$() drop their skulls all the time, and $(item)Dragon Heads$() are all cheap fakes, so don't even bother with those.
